movies.title: The Big Bull
movies.description: uring the late '80s, Hemant Shah, the man with the Midas touch, pulled off the biggest hustle that shook India's financial fabric. Inspired by true events.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.description: The government's decision to push a Hero Registration Act to regulate heroes creates a rift among the Avengers and other heroes.

movies.title: Mulan
movies.description: Masquerading as a male soldier to protect her father and tested every step of the way, Mulan must harness her inner-strength and embrace her true potential.

movies.title: Bahut Hua Sammaan
movies.description: Perpetually failing engineering students Bony and Fundoo get talked into robbing a bank by the campus loon. What follows is something neither anticipated.

movies.title: Angrezi Medium
movies.description: Champak, a simple Mithai-seller, will go to any lengths to fulfil daughter Tarika's dream of studying in London, triggering a chain of hilarious misadventures.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.description: After being injected with a special Super-Soldier serum which leads to him developing superpowers Steve must thwart the plans of a warmonger.

movies.title: Tanhaji
movies.description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

movies.title: Laxmii
movies.description: Aasif's belief in logic and science shatters when he gets possessed by a ghost. What starts as a comical journey soon unearths a dark secret.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: Dr. Strange faces a difficult choice of whether to return to his life of luxury or to protect the world as the most powerful sorcerer in existence.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean-Salazar's Revenge
movies.description: Captain Jack Sparrow senses the winds of ill-fortune when his nemesis Captain Salazar escapes from the Devil's Triangle, to kill every pirate at sea including him.

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.description: In this live-action retelling of 1992 classic, Aladdin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that can make their deepest wishes come true.
